subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The St. Louis Cardinals’ run into the World Series has erased a large portion of a $2.8 million city budget shortfall, preventing the furlough of 7,000 city workers, Mayor Francis Slay said.
snippet: The St. Louis Cardinals’ run into the World Series has erased a large portion of a $2.8 million city budget shortfall, preventing the furlough of 7,000 city workers, Mayor Francis Slay said.
